article_title: Four key people leaving Cass City Public Schools
article_text:
Bad Axe, MI (48413)

Today

Mainly cloudy.

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 58F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author:
TOM GILCHRIST
For the Tribune
